meaningMnemonic: A <kanji>writing</kanji> of your <kanji>theory</kanji> is usually a <vocabulary>thesis</vocabulary>. Remember how school teachers always wanted you to present theories in writing? And to make sure you have a thesis in that <vocabulary>paper</vocabulary>? I do.
readingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word, which usually means on'yomi readings from the kanji. If you know the readings of your kanji you'll know how to read this as well.
